subject: Order now and don't forget about a discount
body:
Dear valued member.
Good news from MyCanadianPharmacy. Spring discounts for all our customers. 
You can buy high quality Canadian products for the price lower than for American drugs.Save on your drugs.
Click herehttp://handcontrol.hk
Experienced team, personal customer care, prompt delivery.No scamming, no frauds.
Yours faithfully,Dan Lyon
